entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning this morning then changing to drizzle near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:34 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
